ComicInfo.Title: Concrete Vixen; Queen of Venus; Dementia Praecox; Wild Night in Tiger Town; Crawl, Worm!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Concrete Vixen: Lloyd introduces his world.
Queen of Venus: The Queen of Venus tells Lloyd via a television message that she's fallen in love with him. So he takes Professor Boring's spaceship to go meet her in Venus.
Dementia Praecox: Lloyd visits the house of a homicidal maniac.
Wild Night in Tiger Town: How the Payne Brothers nearly supported Howlin' Thurston.
Crawl, Worm!: Lloyd is entrapped by a dangerous woman who turns men into worms.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:08:26. [Issue ID 68717]
